price: Wale ambao miongoni mwao umepatana nao ahadi, kisha wanavunja ahadi yao kila mara, wala hawamchi Mungu.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتَّ مِنۡهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ مَرَّةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Nao ni wale ulio fungamana nao kwa mikataba, nao wakawa hawaachi kuivunja kila mara; na watu hao ni Mayahudi ambao hawachelei utukufu wa Mwenyezi Mungu, wala hawakhofu kupatilizwa naye, wala adhabu yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ʿāhadtta min'hum thumma yanquḍūna ʿahdahum fī kulli marratin wahum lā yattaqūna
